title: Bahari Dhow Beach Villas
description: Featuring free WiFi and air conditioning, Bahari Dhow Beach Villas is located in Diani Beach, 2.1 mi from The Diani Beach Shopping Center. Colobus Conservation is 5.6 mi away.

title: Diamonds Leisure Beach & Golf Resort
description: Located on 38 acres of beachfront property, Diamonds Leisure Beach & Golf Resort features an 18-hole golf course overlooking the Indian Ocean.

title: The Sands at Nomad
description: Nestled in an indigenous coastal forest with a garden and a palm-fringed beach, The Sands at Nomad is located in Ukunda. It features an outdoor pool, a spa area and restaurants.

title: Soul Breeze Beach Resort
description: Soul Breeze Beach Resort, located on Diani Beach, features a restaurant and free WiFi. The area is popular for windsurfing, snorkeling and diving.

title: Pinewood Beach Resort and Spa
description: Pinewood Beach Resort and Spa is located on Galu Beach and 6.2 mi away from the Ukunda Airstrip. This boutique hotel features water sport facilities, an outdoor pool and restaurants.

title: The Zubeida Boutique Resort
description: Located in Diani Beach, a 2-minute walk from Diani Beach, The Zubeida Boutique Resort provides accommodations with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant.

title: Flametree Beach Homes
description: Featuring a swimming pool, a garden, a terrace and views of the pool, Flametree Beach Homes is located in Diani Beach and has accommodations with free WiFi.

title: Papillon Lagoon Reef Hotel
description: Set on Diani Beach, Papillon Lagoon Reef features an outdoor pool, beach bar and restaurant terrace all overlooking the Indian Ocean.
